word: W. C. WHITE: WHEN THE BRETHREN GO THERE, THEY WILL BE MET BY THIS PROPOSITION, NAMELY, THAT BROTHER EDSON WHITE AND BROTHER W. O. PALMER HAVE BEEN INSTRUCTED TO STAND TOGETHER. THEY WILL BE TOLD THAT WICKED EFFORTS HAVE BEEN MADE TO SEPARATE THESE TWO MEN AND TO OVERTHROW THE WORK THAT THEY HAVE ORGANIZED THERE; AND THAT THE WORD OF THE LORD HAS FORBIDDEN ANYONE TO ANTAGONIZE THEM IN THEIR WORK.
